Messages: 100 is the number of years in a century.
100 is the number of runs required for a cricket batsman to score a century, a significant milestone.
100 is the approximate number of eyes a scallop has around the edge of its shell.
100 is the number of common administrative grouping unit of homesteads in Northern Europe and Great Britain.
100 is the minimum distance in yards for a Par 3 on a golf course.
100 is the number of yards in an American football field (not including the end zones).
100 is the record number of points scored in one NBA game by a single player, set by Wilt Chamberlain of the Philadelphia Warriors on March 2, 1962 I.
100 is the number of pounds in an American short hundredweight.
100 is the number of blessings a religious Jewish person is expected to utter daily.
